attributes.review: I have gotten so many spam notifications it ran out the battery on my phone after just an hour. It also made my friends and family disappointed in me for my political association. This app makes me ashamed to be American when even the apps we make here are trash. :(
attributes.title: This app destroyed my phone

attributes.review: When I seen this on TikTok it hurts to have to download his dumb dumb dumb stupiddddddd app but I did it for my friends and everyone on TikTok we shall fight agian bc we are strong together TikTok. Trump trump trump her to say your name but this message is for you 🌚nobody likes you your a perv and it’s nasty Obama knows how to do his stuff clearly bc he know more than you .you perv OBAMA 2020 ❤️❤️
attributes.title: Who knows just read👁👄👁

attributes.review: I thought this app would be amazing! But then I saw a big Cheeto puff on the front page and it sparked my PTSD!!! I have also seen several penguins in random places all over my neighborhood! I also see the White House! It’s as scary as it can get! Please make Obama great again! Oops, I meant America. May you all be safe, to my fellow POC... oops! Autocorrect! Be save my fellow Cheeto Supporters🤢
attributes.title: AWFUL!😖🤮🤧

attributes.review: Hello, when I downloaded this app I wanted to see what was going on but as time went on it hacked into all my other apps and started glitching my phone it got to the point where is coulnt do anything but be in this app. I am fairly certain this app is trash man and it should be shut down immediately. 😘
attributes.title: This is terrible!

attributes.review: This app took 4 years to download actually and then once it did I clicked on it and it deleted all of my photos and then shut my phone down and I had to go buy a new phone. It’s so terrible Apple please remove it from the App Store so no one else has to deal with this terrible awful app!!
attributes.title: Terrible!

attributes.review:
I opened the app and my phone set a blaze. I don’t know about you but it was super close to my American flag and so that burned too. I blame Trump for the cause of my American flag being ruined. 

Once I got a new phone I opened it on my new phone and I dropped it in my fish tank and it schooled my fish so I also blame Trump for the murder of my fish.
attributes.title: This app caused my phone to set on fire.

attributes.review: i was so excited to get this app to support “president” Trump but it took DAYS to download and when it finally did it was so poorly designed that i couldn’t navigate through it without getting a headache and every time i clicked on something my whole phone would crash. so disappointed.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: as soon as i downloaded it i got a call from a random number that just repeatedly said “trump 2020” over and over and when i hung up it kept calling me so i blocked the number. but the next day a package showed up at my doorstep. i didn’t want to open it since the return address was from the white house! every time i opened the app, id get a pop up notification saying “open the box”. finally i decided to open it. when i opened it the only thing inside was a piece of paper that said trump 2020. donald trump is stalking me through his app❤️
attributes.title: donald is a stalker

attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to see what our presidents campaign would look like. So many bugs, technology issues, etc. It kept crashing and took forever to download. Such a horrible experience for me and many others I know who have tried downloading the app.
attributes.title: Disappointed.

attributes.review: I don’t get this app. I have a brand new IPhone8 and this app made my phone crash and ever since I’ve deleted it, it’s started working again. Trumps information is false. I hate trump. He’s a hot Cheeto. If u ban tiktok, u might want to hide in that bunker more often. Black lives matter.
attributes.title: Right after I got this app my phone crashed and wouldn’t work/Tiktok
